segments.text: This is the room 1425 , we asked for the room service an hour ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: we are very sorry to cause you a lot of inconvenience .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We're rather busy right now . It will take another 15minutes
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it really going to take that long , will you rush the order ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid it will take 15 minutes at most .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ha , well , we have no choice .
segments.speaker: S1
